content: this simple yet timeless liora camisole knit in berroco modern linen yarn is a wardrobe essential for warm weather the light breathable fabric offers a perfect blend of comfort and style while its classic design makes it versatile enough to pair with anything from jeans to skirts on its own or layered over tees a must-have piece for effortless everyday elegance liora is knit seamlessly in the round from the bottom up with integrated i-cord straps **sizes** 1 2 3 4 4 5 6 7 8 9 10 **finished measurements** bust 32½ 36½ 40½ 44½ 48½ 52½ 56½ 60½ 64½ 68½ 72½ / 82 5 92 5 103 113 123 133 5 143 5 153 5 164 174 184 cm length 16½ 16¾ 17 17½ 18 18½ 19 19¼ 19¼ 20 20¼ / 42 42 5 43 44 5 45 5 47 48 5 49 49 51 51 5 cm including straps shown in size 36½ / 92 5 cm modeled with approximately 2 / 5 cm positive ease recommended ease 0 2 / 0 5 cm positive ease **yarn** berroco modern linen 100 g 1 2 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 hanks #11332 nocturnal **needles** 24 32 / 60 80 cm circular needles sizes 3 / 3 25 mm and 5 / 3 75 mm *or size to obtain gauge* 1 set double-pointed needles size 5 / 3 75 mm for i-cord **notions** stitch markers waste yarn to hold stitches tapestry needle **gauge** 20 sts and 32 row/rnds = 4 / 10 cm in st st using larger needle *gauge shown is after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge *
